name: Alan RICHARDSON, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent
docket_number: 179 Middle District Allocation Docket 1984, No. 17 M.D. Appeal Docket 1985

judges: Before LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPA-LA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: Alan RICHARDSON, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, to-wit, this 25th day of February, 1985, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby granted and Judgment of Sentence is vacated and the record remanded to the Court of Common Pleas of Dauphin County to permit appellant to exercise his right of allocution.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
488 A.2d 276
Alan RICHARDSON, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 25, 1985.
Before LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPA-LA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
